product_name: MilaniKeep It Full Plumping Lip Liner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani Keep It Full Plumping Lip Liner is a richly pigmented, creamy lip liner with 8-Hour Wear that delivers immediate plumping with a spicy tingle.
details: DetailsFeaturesRichly pigmented, creamy wear for up to 8 hours*Immediately, visibly plumps* with tingling Chili Fruit Extract & Ginger Root OilEnhanced with 1% Maxi-LipTM for long-term plumping benefitsInfused with antioxidant & moisture-rich cocoa & mango buttersResearch Results100% experienced immediately plumper looking lips, full coverage color & comfortable wear*94% agree does not bleed or transfer all day**Results observed in a consumer panel survey & clinical testBenefitsMade in USAItem 2641488How To UseUse Keep It Full Plumping Lip Liner to trace the outer edge of your lip line. For a fuller pout, slightly overline the Cupid's Bow and center of the bottom lip. Fill in lips with your favorite Milani lip color.Pro Tips: For a natural looking lip contour, choose a liner that is 1 to 2 shades deeper than your natural lip color and fill in with your favorite Milani lip color. For maximum pout effect, apply Keep It Full Plumping liner as an all-over base, then coat lips with a high-shine top layer of your favorite Milani gloss, balm or lip oil.IngredientsFire Sign: Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Wax, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Kaolin, Diisostearyl Malate, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dicalcium Phosphate, Zeolite, Calcium Silicate, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de carnauba, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Tribehenin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isostearic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Silica, Methyl Nicotinate, Canola Oil, Lactic Acid, Red 7 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492).
how_to_use: Use Keep It Full Plumping Lip Liner to trace the outer edge of your lip line. For a fuller pout, slightly overline the Cupid's Bow and center of the bottom lip. Fill in lips with your favorite Milani lip color.Pro Tips: For a natural looking lip contour, choose a liner that is 1 to 2 shades deeper than your natural lip color and fill in with your favorite Milani lip color. For maximum pout effect, apply Keep It Full Plumping liner as an all-over base, then coat lips with a high-shine top layer of your favorite Milani gloss, balm or lip oil.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de carnauba

reviews.headline: Full plumping lip liner
reviews.comments: Bought this for my daughter' and she loved it. Great color match. Smoothness of the liner was easy to apply to lips.

reviews.headline: Plumping lip liner
reviews.comments: This is a plumping lip liner, it's literally called keep it full plumping lip liner so if you dont like the tingling sensation then this is not for you, I personally dont feel it burning my lips. The shades are beautiful and i do feel like it lasts on my lips!!!

reviews.headline: Incredibly warm/pink toned.
reviews.comments: I was hoping for more of a cool toned mauve/pink shade based on the swatches and images shown but Over the top and Go All Pout are both incredibly warm. If that's what you're looking for them the formula is great. Just be warned it does have a plump.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I was very disappointed with this pencil because the smell is not appealing at all, then it doesn't glide on and it burns but I didn't see any plump.

reviews.headline: Great Liner, Terrible to Sharpen
reviews.comments: Love the color and wear, but falls apart when sharpened. Even put it in the freezer to harden it up. Just disenegrated when sharpened. Waste of money.

reviews.headline: READ WHAT YOU BUY
reviews.comments: this is a PLUMPING LINER. it burns for a reason. formula is bomb, shades are decent, love my taupes/browns

reviews.headline: Burning lip liner
reviews.comments:
I assumed this was a normal lip liner until i applied it and OUCH .. I wasn't expecting it to burn after thr application but the burn intensified more and more . 

Gives a pretty pout to the lips but you might as will do a little swirl with jalapeÃ±os. ðŸ˜³

reviews.headline: Watch out, it burns!
reviews.comments: I like the formula and the shade go all pout but I wasnt expecting this lipliner to burn so bad! Their "keep it full" lipgloss has a slight minty tingle which is not bad at all but this is wayyyy more intense and the burning sensation lasts for a while. I sadly wont be using it again for that reason

reviews.headline: Pretty color and lasts but burns
reviews.comments: Go All Pout is such a pretty pink liner, but like another review mentioned, it burns my lips. The burning eventually goes away, but I don't like that it does that.

reviews.headline: I love the liner so much butâ€¦
reviews.comments: It burns my lips for some reason!! I'm so sad because I love the color so much

reviews.headline: Long lasting
reviews.comments: It def tingles when applied. Very long lasting & does not budge. I bought hotshot and went back & purchased 2 more.

reviews.headline: Raw-view
reviews.comments: Its nice and i think it has potential but i need them to make it long lasting.

reviews.headline: Love it! Butâ€¦
reviews.comments: I honestly like everything about the product: so many different colors, it is smooth, and it stays on for so long! It is a reasonable price, although I wish it lasted a little longer, because I had only bought one and it had only lasted five days or so. I guess it makes sense that is is only 10 dollars, but stillâ€¦

reviews.headline: Beware of color
reviews.comments: This is a nice lipliner and does stay on all day, as they say. I did not find very much plumping.  And beware of the color. For me, a color that looked perfect (over the top) darkened considerably on my lips.  It's too dark for me, and I won't use it.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: These dont budge and stay on all day ! I need every color !

media.headline: Wow! A liner that really stays on!
media.caption: The best plumper and liner%!

faceoff_positive.comments: Best Lip liner I have ever used. Stays on through, drinking and eating and occasional kiss! Keeps lipstick from feathering in those pesky lip lines. Try this you  wouldn't disappointed.
faceoff_positive.headline: Wow! A liner that really stays on!

faceoff_negative.comments:
The stinging is a little bit too much for me even if it's just like literally 30 seconds... I think because the liner concentrated on a small area, like the corner of my lip, It's more intense sensation... whereas the plumping gloss I've been using hurts less coz it spreads out all over my lips. The stinging of this liner makes my lips corner a bit red and smudgy... you can see it a bit in one of my pics where it says Liner+Lipstick. But in another photo this problem is fixed by just going over it a few times  with the liner and it covers up the redness and it defines the lips and gives a clean edge.
      I tested the Milani Plumping Lip Liner-150 HotShot and had mixed results. While it claimed to have a plumping effect, I didn't notice much of a difference in person. Photos showed a slight effect, but it was barely noticeable. I picked the wrong shade but it works great under my lipstick. The good thing is it glides on so smoothly and lasts long and it's very matte... like super matte.
       The color 150 HotShot is a darker color in person like more brownish but in photos it appears to be like an orangey brown. You can smell and taste a little bit of buttery cocoa but only for a few seconds and it fades away.
      That rubbery end of the lip liner threw me off at first, it gives it a pen-like appearance like I can just click or twist it to extend... coz this lip liner is not the traditional pencil design. I was like "how do I even get more product out?" lol but then I realized it was sharpenable.
faceoff_negative.headline: HotShot is Hot as in Spicy ðŸ¥µ
